review: "Barbie in a Mermaid Tale" didn't quite hit the mark for me. While the premise of a mermaid adventure sounds fun, the story felt overly simplistic and predictable, lacking the depth and originality I enjoy in graphic novels and comics. The characters were one-dimensional, and the plot resolved too neatly, which didn't engage me as much as I hoped. The illustrations were cute, but they weren't enough to salvage the weak story. I was hoping for something more engaging and nuanced, especially given my love for detailed and compelling narratives. This book just didn't offer the complexity or humor I've come to expect from my favorite series.
